CommunityShortDescription: The MITRE Security Automation Framework (SAF) brings together open-source, accessible applications, techniques, libraries, and tools developed by MITRE and the community to streamline security automation for Systems and in DevOps pipelines.
CommunityLongDec: The MITRE Security Automation Framework (SAF) brings together open-source, accessible applications, techniques, libraries, and tools developed by MITRE and the community to streamline security automation for Systems and in DevOps pipelines.
AboutGDGProgram: The MITRE Security Automation Framework (SAF) brings together open-source, accessible applications, techniques, libraries, and tools developed by MITRE and the community to streamline security automation for Systems and in DevOps pipelines.

CommunityGuideline.name: Be nice
CommunityGuideline.des: We're all part of the same community, so be friendly, welcoming, and generally a nice person. Be someone that other people want to be around.
